pageContent.descriptionText: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">We don’t formally survey patient satisfaction. Everything we learn is through the information our patients volunteer to us. Overall, I’d just like to see more success stories and fewer complaints.</welcomeText>
